4Helpers #permalink

helper classes and systems

4.1footer: fixed bottom #permalink

fixes the footer at the bottom of the page

4.2general helpers #permalink

  • .text-align-left
    aligns text left
  • .text-align-center
    aligns text center
  • .text-align-right
    aligns text right
  • .display-inline
    coerces inline display for element
  • .hidden
    coerces element to not be rendered
  • .float-R
    floats element right
  • .float-L
    floats element left
  • .content-inset
    sets element at 80% and gives automatic margins on each side

general-use helpers to be used on the site

4.3kss helpers #permalink

  • .kss-display-rect
    creates a rectangle using Mixin.rectangle to be used in kss displays
